I am aware that you cannot copyright the radio shack box, but can you possi=
ble copyright the plans and include the box as a piece of euipment used to =
build your original creation?=A0 I would do a quick copyright, throw the pl=
ans in an envelope and next day mail them to yourself.=A0 I , myself have d=
one this with artwork and it does hold up in court or at least in MI.=A0 As=
ide from that, you have everyone here to vouch for you, in addition to the =
group e-mails.=A0 
=A0
People never fail to surprise me . . . I am certain =
you have a world of support Mike!!=A0

Suzanne May

ranormal Society

op my claim of being the originator of the hack of the 12-470.

surprise.
Why... it was on this very forum that Bruce admitted that his 
at=
tempted hack of the 12-470 did not work, after I had shared my 
success wit=
h all of you.
I've included the forum messages from last year with their da=
te and 
time stamps. The messages are still right here on this forum.

website.
B=
ut, as you can see in the following messages, Bruce told me his

d not work, posting this after my hack.

I would not even mention this if B=
ruce's e-mail to me wasn't so 
threatening. .. I just wanted to get the rec=
ord straight.

- Mike (UFO Geek)
